entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Makati cop files complaint vs Spanish involved in Dasma village incident

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Makati cop files complaint vs Spanish involved in Dasma village incident
media:group.media:description:
Makati City Police Master Sergeant Roland Madrona has filed a complaint against Spanish Javier Parra Salvador following their heated argument in a posh village in Makati City.

entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Mayor Isko Moreno confirms plan of total lockdown in Tondo

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Mayor Isko Moreno confirms plan of total lockdown in Tondo
media:group.media:description:
Manila Mayor Isko Moreno said city government officials are studying the possibility of implementing a total lockdown in Tondo due to the threat of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

entry.title: LIVESTREAM: Palace briefing with presidential spokesman Harry Roque | April 28, 2020 | Replay

media:group.media:title: LIVESTREAM: Palace briefing with presidential spokesman Harry Roque | April 28, 2020 | Replay
media:group.media:description:
New list of areas under the enhanced community quarantine until May 15, 2020, according to Presidential Spokesperson Harry Roque:
-National Capital Region -Central Luzon (except Aurora) -CALABARZON -Pangasinan -Benguet -Baguio City -Iloilo Province -Cebu Province -Cebu City -Davao City

entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: PCG keeps an eye on 7 cruise ships with Pinoy crew in Manila Bay

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: PCG keeps an eye on 7 cruise ships with Pinoy crew in Manila Bay
media:group.media:description:
Seven cruise ships in Manila Bay with Filipino crew are being monitored by the Philippine Coast Guard (PCG). A total of 428 Filipino crew from one of the cruise ships already disembarked over the weekend with Bureau of Quarantine (BOQ) clearance, while the rest are still awaiting BOQ clearance.
